cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field
movie_description: Summary : The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

cast: Cast : Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
movie_description: Summary : When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

cast: Cast : James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell
movie_description: Summary : An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

cast: Cast : Dulquer Salmaan, Mrunal Thakur, Rashmika Mandanna, Sumanth
movie_description: Summary : An orphan soldier, Lieutenant Ram's life changes, after he gets a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them. When he comes back to his camp in Kashmir,After he gets caught in jail, he sends a letter to Sita which won't reach her.

cast: Cast : Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
movie_description: Summary : A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

cast: Cast : Philippe Noiret, Enzo Cannavale, Antonella Attili, Isa Danieli
movie_description: Summary : A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman, Tiny Sandford
movie_description: Summary : The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Harry Myers
movie_description: Summary : With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

cast: Cast : Vijay Sethupathi, Adithya Bhaskar, Trisha Krishnan, Gouri Kishan
movie_description: Summary : Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

cast: Cast : Ryunosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryo Narita, Aoi Yûki
movie_description: Summary : Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

cast: Cast : Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgård
movie_description: Summary : Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

movie_name: Title : Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
cast: Cast : Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson, Gerry Robert Byrne
movie_description: Summary : When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

cast: Cast : Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Lorella Cravotta
movie_description: Summary : Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

cast: Cast : James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore
movie_description: Summary : A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

cast: Cast : Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds, Jean Hagen
movie_description: Summary : A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

cast: Cast : Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston
movie_description: Summary : A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

cast: Cast : Sushant Singh Rajput, Sanjana Sanghi, Sahil Vaid, Saswata Chatterjee
movie_description: Summary : The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.

cast: Cast : Sushant Singh Rajput, Shraddha Kapoor, Varun Sharma, Prateik Patil Babbar
movie_description: Summary : A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

directors: Director : Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood
cast: Cast : Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O'Neil
movie_description: Summary : A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

movie_name: Title : The Secret in Their Eyes
cast: Cast : Ricardo Darín, Soledad Villamil, Pablo Rago, Carla Quevedo
movie_description: Summary : A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

cast: Cast : Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Jack Lemmon, George Raft
movie_description: Summary : After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

movie_name: Title : To Be or Not to Be
cast: Cast : Carole Lombard, Jack Benny, Robert Stack, Felix Bressart
movie_description: Summary : During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

cast: Cast : Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Joe Keaton, Erwin Connelly
movie_description: Summary : A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

cast: Cast : Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol, Katrina Kaif
movie_description: Summary : Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

cast: Cast : Kim Min-hee, Ha Jung-woo, Cho Jin-woong, Moon So-ri
movie_description: Summary : A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

cast: Cast : Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn
movie_description: Summary : A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

cast: Cast : Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Andrea Eckert, Hanno Pöschl
movie_description: Summary : A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

movie_name: Title : Portrait of a Lady on Fire
cast: Cast : Noémie Merlant, Adèle Haenel, Luàna Bajrami, Valeria Golino
movie_description: Summary : On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

movie_name: Title : In the Mood for Love
cast: Cast : Tony Leung Chiu-wai, Maggie Cheung, Siu Ping-Lam, Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung
movie_description: Summary : Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

cast: Cast : Anton Walbrook, Marius Goring, Moira Shearer, Robert Helpmann
movie_description: Summary : A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

cast: Cast : Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Vernon Dobtcheff, Louise Lemoine Torrès

cast: Cast : Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine, George Sanders, Judith Anderson
movie_description: Summary : A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

cast: Cast : Leslie Cheung, Fengyi Zhang, Gong Li, You Ge
movie_description: Summary : Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

movie_name: Title : The Best Years of Our Lives
cast: Cast : Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews, Fredric March, Teresa Wright
movie_description: Summary : Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

movie_description: Summary : A renegade reporter trailing a young runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York, and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

cast: Cast : Victor Sjöström, Bibi Andersson, Ingrid Thulin, Gunnar Björnstrand
movie_description: Summary : After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

cast: Cast : Irène Jacob, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Frédérique Feder, Jean-Pierre Lorit
movie_description: Summary : A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

cast: Cast : Nien-Jen Wu, Elaine Jin, Issei Ogata, Kelly Lee
movie_description: Summary : Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

movie_name: Title : A Woman Under the Influence
cast: Cast : Gena Rowlands, Peter Falk, Fred Draper, Lady Rowlands
movie_description: Summary : Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

cast: Cast : George O'Brien, Janet Gaynor, Margaret Livingston, Bodil Rosing
movie_description: Summary : A sophisticated city woman seduces a farmer and convinces him to murder his wife and join her in the city, but he ends up rekindling his romance with his wife when he changes his mind at the last moment.

cast: Cast : Jung Woo-sung, Son Ye-jin, Jong-hak Baek, Seon-jin Lee
movie_description: Summary : A young couple's enduring love is tested when 27-year-old Su-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.

movie_description: Summary : A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

cast: Cast : Ranbir Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Ileana D'Cruz, Saurabh Shukla
movie_description: Summary : Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

cast: Cast : Aamir Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Akshaye Khanna, Preity G Zinta
movie_description: Summary : Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

cast: Cast : Gong Li, Jingwu Ma, Saifei He, Cuifen Cao
movie_description: Summary : A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

movie_name: Title : A Short Film About Love
cast: Cast : Grazyna Szapolowska, Olaf Lubaszenko, Stefania Iwinska, Piotr Machalica
movie_description: Summary : A naive inexperienced young man spies on a woman who lives across the courtyard, and falls in love with her. He starts using tricks which he hopes will lead to them meeting.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Merna Kennedy, Al Ernest Garcia, Harry Crocker
movie_description: Summary : The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

cast: Cast : Greta Lee, Teo Yoo, John Magaro, Moon Seung-ah
movie_description: Summary : Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrested apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Twenty years later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront notions of love and destiny.

cast: Cast : Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright, Chris Sarandon
movie_description: Summary : A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

cast: Cast : Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Rosemarie DeWitt, J.K. Simmons
movie_description: Summary : While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.
